featured.text: In 2011, they were voted as one of the world’s top five performance groups by audiences of Japan Broadcasting Corporation’s Amazing Voice program.
Since Michael was the best candidate, the committee voted for him to take charge of the company’s sales department.

definition.zh_def: 投票，表達對某個候選人或提案的支持或反對。
definition.en_def: To express one's choice or opinion in a decision-making process, typically in an election.
definition.example: I will vote for my favorite candidate in the upcoming election.
